programmes.show_description: Relax, unwind and chill out with an hour of classic and contemporary tunes.
See programme schedules for BBC Radio 5 Live.
The latest news and weather for Wales and a look ahead to this morning's Radio Wales Breakfast.
A lively mix of music to start the day. Perfect for your pod!
Weekly dive into Welsh politics with Felicity Evans and James Williams.
Everything you need to know as you wake up.
Lucy brightens your morning with great music and entertainment. Call 03700 100 110 Text 81012 or message via X @bbcradiowales.
Be part of the nation's conversation.
Celebrity guests, the latest blockbuster film reviews, and we play The Name Game! Call or WhatsApp 03700 100 110 Text 81012.
Everything you need to know as you head home.
A group of enthusiastic book club members review their latest read.
Elin Fflur is all about iconic 70s basslines this week with the power mix, along with great songs from the decades and Eleri Llwyd's Welsh Language track.
Elin Fflur's 80s long player is a George Michael hit, plus classics from the 1980s at 8. And we hear from Hefin Huw's Twll Triongl.
Elin Fflur takes a deep dive into Whitney Houston's iconic, I Will Always Love you. Get your weekend started with Elin's 90s bangers Welsh anthems.
H from Steps takes you into the weekend with great music and chat.
H from Steps has your ultimate party playlist. Not just for Fridays!
See programme schedules for BBC Radio 5 Live.
Everything you need to know as you wake up.
Your dedications and song requests from the 1950s-90s. Can you guess the Stuck in the Middle song? Text 81012, email moneyfornothing@bbc.co.uk or call 03700 100 110.
Singer-songwriter Rick Astley chats to Lucy about turning 60 and his plans for new music and a UK tour; plus comedian Mike Bubbins on learning to speak Welsh in one year.
Live commentary, guests and analysis. Your home for Welsh sport.
Live URC rugby commentary of Dragons v Benetton. Kick-off 5.30pm.
Top tunes, classic and new, for your Saturday night. Plus the Wales Mix.
The best in new Welsh music, exclusive sessions, interviews and demos.
